note:
Writer. Literary representation: Lisette Verhagen. Please direct queries here: https://petersfraserdunlop.com/clients/annie-zaidi/

Author of 'City of Incident'; 'Prelude to a Riot'; 'Bread, Cement, Cactus: A memoir of belonging and dislocation', 'Gulab'; 'Love Stories # 1 to 14'; 'Known Turf: Bantering with Bandits and Other True Tales'. Co-author of 'The Good Indian Girl'; 'Crush'; 'The Almost Drizzles of May'.
Editor of 'Unbound: 2000 Years of Indian Women's Writing' and 'Equal Halves'.
Author of 3 Plays
